TEXT.TITLE: MACMILLAN BLOEDEL <MMBLF> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: MacMillan Bloedel Ltd said it will redeem all outstanding nine pct series J debentures on April 27, 1987 for 34.9 mln U.S. dlrs, plus a premium of one pct and accrued and unpaid interest. The series J debentures were issued in Europe in 1977 and were due February 1992, the company said. Reuter
